title: Business Transaction Attestation Event (Kind 9905)
description: Full event schema for transaction.attestation (kind 9905) - signed event sent by business to attest customer transaction

id.description: Deterministic event hash as defined in NIP-01
id.errorMessage: id must be a 64-character lowercase hex string

created_at.errorMessage: created_at must be a timestamp expressed in seconds (not milliseconds)
created_at.description: The timestamp of the note creation

pubkey.errorMessage: pubkey must be a secp256k1 public key
pubkey.description: The public key of the note's author

tags.errorMessage: tags must be an array of valid tag tuples

sig.errorMessage: sig must be a 128-character lowercase hex string

kind.description: Kind 9905 identifies a business transaction attestation

id.description: Deterministic event hash as defined in NIP-01
id.errorMessage: id must be a 64-character lowercase hex string

pubkey.errorMessage: pubkey must be a 64-character lowercase hex string (secp256k1 public key)

content.description: JSON string containing transaction attestation payload with iso_time and qts_labels

items.description: Unsigned rumor ID of the original reservation.request (kind 9901)
items.errorMessage: e tag value must be a 64-character lowercase hex string (unsigned rumor ID)

errorMessage.contains: tags must include an e tag with format ['e', '<unsigned-9901-rumor-id>']

items.errorMessage: p tag value must be a 64-character lowercase hex string

errorMessage.contains: tags must include a p tag with format ['p', '<customerPublicKey>']
